unnormalised: Okay, so you're looking for the address of a government office or something, right? Well, it can be a bit of a pain to find the exact right one sometimes. They're always moving buildings or changing names, aren't they?
normalised: Okay, so you're looking for the address of a government office or something, right? Well, it can be a bit of a pain to find the exact right one sometimes. They're always moving buildings or changing names, aren't they?

unnormalised: If you're trying to find the regional passport office in Chennai, the old address used to be at Shastri Bhavan, 26 Haddows Road, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600006. But always double-check online or call them first, okay? Especially since addresses of government institutions tend to change without warning. I wasted an auto-rickshaw fare when the Labour Office in Andheri shifted to a new building, and I didn't know!
normalised: If you're trying to find the regional passport office in Chennai, the old address used to be at Shastri Bhavan, twenty six Haddows Road, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu six hundred thousand and six. But always double-check online or call them first, okay? Especially since addresses of government institutions tend to change without warning. I wasted an auto-rickshaw fare when the Labour Office in Andheri shifted to a new building, and I didn't know!

unnormalised: For something like the main branch of the State Bank of India (SBI) in Mumbai, a common address is Madame Cama Road, Nariman Point, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400021. But SBI has branches practically everywhere, so make sure you're going to the right one for your work. Different departments are also often located in different parts of the city.
normalised: For something like the main branch of the State Bank of India (S-B-I) in Mumbai, a common address is Madame Cama Road, Nariman Point, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand and twenty one. But S-B-I has branches practically everywhere, so make sure you're going to the right one for your work. Different departments are also often located in different parts of the city.

unnormalised: And hey, if itâ€™s something like the Income Tax Department, they have offices spread all over the major cities. For instance, in Delhi, one important address to check is the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) office at North Block, New Delhi, 110001. However, based on which ward you are in, they may have different offices, and the PIN codes can be easily jumbled. So confirm before you post any documents!
normalised: And hey, if it's something like the Income Tax Department, they have offices spread all over the major cities. For instance, in Delhi, one important address to check is the Central Board of Direct Taxes (C-B-D-T) office at North Block, New Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and one. However, based on which ward you are in, they may have different offices, and the P-I-N codes can be easily jumbled. So confirm before you post any documents!

unnormalised: Ultimately, always confirm the address by searching online directly on the official government website (like for the UIDAI headquarters or something). And always, *always* check the PIN code! That will save you a lot of headaches and wasted trips, trust me!
normalised: Ultimately, always confirm the address by searching online directly on the official government website (like for the U-I-D-A-I headquarters or something). And always, always check the P-I-N code! That will save you a lot of headaches and wasted trips, trust me!
